price: Hakika watu wema watakunywa katika vinywaji vilivyo changanyika na kafuri!
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
footnotes: Hakika walio kuwa wakweli katika Imani yao watakunywa mvinyo iliyo changanywa na maji ya kafuri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
